borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div>The proposed development,&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">by reason of its bulk, massing and design&nbsp;is considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area. Specifically, it presents an&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">incongruous and</span></span><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"> discordant feature that is&nbsp;disproportionately large in comparison to the host dwellinghouses, and surrounding dwellinghouses as it would double&nbsp;the size of the original dwellinghouse&nbsp;and the vast majority of dwellinghosues within the immediate area and disrupts&nbsp;the pattern of the terrace row in which the application site is situated as well as the terrace rows on the opposite side of the junction at a prominent position.</span></span>&nbsp;As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
CP3 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough
Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential

description: Construction of a two storey side extension including front bay windows and alteration to the roof profile
